content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out for a walk, around 10 o'clock(as usual). my driveway is probably 50 yards or so. when i reached mid point of the driveway instantly i had noticed a very bright light at what appeared to be a new flood light atop the neighbors house. after noticing the light i realized the only noise in the neighborhood was the sound of dogs barking. first the dog barking came from further down the road. as the light approached me the dog barking followed. by the time i had reached the end of my driveway the craft was directly above. this ufo was so low even my dog had taken notice. the only sound emitting from this craft was a very low hum. when it was over head i noticed a strange opening on the bottom, and inside looked to be "red veins". normally i would brush this off as some type of airplane but, something just didn't seem right. even my dog was watching this craft with such intensity. when i had seen the under side for some odd reason my heart dropped. i stood there dumb founded, watching this craft disappear behind the trees.
content.summary: Large, low flying triangluar ufo with, bright light on" front tip", and strange opening on the under belly.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from the movies with my girlfriend when all sudden on 104 i look up in the sky a bright light cutting thru grab my attention i looked at it for a good 15 second and then told my girlfriend to look at the plane when she looked it up and try finding it disappear right front of my eyes so fast we both looked for 5-10 min to see if we couldve found it like it was a plane but the sky was clear as it could be
content.summary: Bright light in the sky i couldve seen the light was coming thru the clouds star-like

content.detailedDescription: *(name deleted--cms/sg) my live-in girlfriend at the time and i were on january 15  1988 driving west southwest between west chester pa and marshalltown pa on route 162 around10 pm on our way to a party in downingtown pa.About a mile outside west chester while coming over a crest of a hill i could see approximately 1/2 half mile away what looked like 3 small red lights in the sky they caught my eye immediately because i could tell that they were hovering in one spot.I pointed the lights out to *(name deleted--cms/sg)and she seen them immediately because from our initial viewpoint they were almost directly in front of us. i knew immediately that something was  because in my early twenties i had taken a proximately 5 airplane flight lessons in small planes and knew a small plane cannot stay stationary .*(name deleted--cms/sg) and i continued driving and got closer to where the lights were we could distinguish that  the three lights seem to be a black triangle with the three red lights at each edge.We rode to a spot approximately 400 yards to the right of the object,we stopped the car 50 feet right before a little bridge that runs over  a part of the brandywine creek.The object was also directly over the brandywine creek and tree line a place i had known  and fished  at  maybe 100 times since my childhood.*(name deleted--cms/sg)and exited my car and stood on route 162 for about 5 minutes watching the object.After about 5 minutes the three lights rotated very slowly clockwise and started moving to about 200 yards to our left and about 100 yards in the air.Kim and i both said we thought we seen a black triangle with three red lights,the sky was clear and beautiful that night.The craft slowly headed back toward west chester flying over farm fields along route 162.We got back in the car and turned the car back going east north-east on route162 back toward west chester pa.We could clearly see the object we heard no noise from it the whole time,it was moving very  stable and smooth very controlled it seemed.We rode for the 3/4 mile until we had to climb the small hill that from where we had first viewed the object but coming from the opposite direction    when we crested the hill the object had completely disappeared before flying directly over my hometown of west chester.We were baffled more because we were right behind the craft and thought we would be able to see it fly over the town  but it now had completely disappeared from the sky.We continued on to the party in downingtown pa,reaching there by 11pm.When we got to the party we told several people and they all laughed.I was a little more   perplexed by the event and  at approximately   11-30 pm called from sister of my girlfriend  the pa state police barrack in embreville pa. which is on the same route 162 about 3 miles from where we seen the object.I was surprised to hear from the state police dispatcher     that they had received about twenty calls before mine of mysteriously lights in peoples backyards in the area that night.Later that night after *(name deleted--cms/sg)and i had returned home and were in bed *(name deleted--cms/sg)told to me that she was scarred because from the time of her life from 8-15 she had seen small creatures come to her window and had seen bright lights in her yard many times.This is really strange because *(name deleted--cms/sg)grew up in a house that was 5 miles away on the same route 162 we had just witnessed the object on. at the the time of the incident i was working  in new castle delaware as an investment banker.My office was in the same complex as newcastle airport  .I had cultivated a young aircraft engineer that worked in an office across the complex from mine as an investor and we became friends.My investor had told me previously that he was helping to develop the military's top secret silent helicopters and that some prototypes of their technology were actually at new castle airport.I related to the engineer my story,the engineer told me that at the distance that i had experienced the object that if it were his helicopter that we would have heard it,yet we experienced no sound even while outside the car and no atmospheric disturbance at all
content.summary: Seen three red lights sitting 300 feet above trees,got close enough to see black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I had woken up at around 7 a.M and was lying in my bed still half asleep until i saw a sudden flash through my curtains. i have seen this flash since, but this was the first time it had happened, consequently i looked out of my window after hastily lifting up the curtain. my eyes were immediately drawn to directly above the opposite houses beyond the garden and end of my road. 
there seemed to be a bright white light that looked as if it was climbing up in the air, making me originally think it was a plane because they often fly over my house and there can be more than one at any time. i wasn't alerted by it at this point because i was thinking it was a plane, until i realised that i should be hearing the engine noise at that time. i became interested and watched it carefully.
it didn't do anything dramatic and it acted very much like a plane. then another light lit up directly behind it,(there was a gap between them).
it was then that i also noticed a plane coming in from my left and i realised the first object's flight path crossed over the plane's. the first object passed right in front of the plane but i'm not sure if they were at the same altitude. once past the plane, the light went out and i came to the conclusion that it wasn't plane due to the fact i could easily see the outline of the plane from the left and i couldn't see an outline from the light.
the second bright light passed just behind the plane before also going out suddenly. during all this i was incredibly intrigued and once they had both gone out i was left with a shock. i haven't seen anything like this before or since. i told a couple family members but they said others would have seen something like that, but i doubt many people would be awake and looking at the skies at 7 in the morning.
content.summary: Two bright flying objects

content.detailedDescription: Today woke about 6:20, in a  sweat feeling uncomfortable.  i got up and went into living room.  i opened the blinds, and watched the traffic going to the bus parking lot. i looked out to my left; i saw a large bright light which i first thought was a fire but soon realized it was a sphere and moving.  the sphere was about quarter size, and extremely bright, [welders torch bright] 35 degrees from horizon. i was looking for my video cam. no luck. i went back to window to track its location & try to decide if stay & take notes or keep looking for camera.  i looked for about 5-8 min for cam. i found it.  i went outside into parking lot, i could not find ufo in sky. i ran up & down parking lot to get a look to where it went.  i finally saw a faint glimmer of white light thru the trees in woods, in 3-5 sec. it was gone.
content.summary: Saw large ball of light , sw of my location, moving very slow,  passed ovrhd .

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a family bbq and i looked up towards the east and could see a triangular looking craft with 3 bright lights, it seemed to be not moving at all.  we could see it rotating slightly every few minutes.  im not very good at measuring something from a distance but i could tell this thing was quite large.  my video camera batter was dead i had my son go try to get a charge real quick on it, and i called up my mother to tell her to look outside to see if she could see it and by that time i looked up and it was gone, i never even saw it move or leave the sky, that really made me and my kids a little frightened
content.summary: Triangular object with 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a meeting and to my surprise i saw huge white lights in the sky, they were the biggest lights ive ever seen, almost looked like a car was up in the air, i could tell it was nothing normal, it was pretty low to the ground, as i got right close up to it i saw that it was just hovering in the air and i saw the exact shape of it, it was a triangle ufo with two lights on one side and a even bigger one underneath, it was the most insane thing ive ever seen in my life, it started slowly moving again so i flipped around my car and followed it for 10 minutes or so and finally i saw that it once again had came to a stop and within seconds of me stopping my car one of the spotlight beams shined down towards my vehicle, which scared the crap out of me, another car pulled up behind me which was nice to know i wasnt the only one seeing this huge ufo. i got so scared and freaked over the light on my car i flipped around and sped off as soon as i could, i didnt want to be an abductee or anything.  but i never thought in a lifetime i would see something like this ever.
content.summary: Huge triangle craft  with big lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the highway and could see huge spotlights in the sky, it seemed as if they were moving very slow. the lights were so big and bright i could see the beams shining down to the ground, i knew id never seen any lights this big on a plan or any thing we have. and then as i was just coming beside it on the highway i could see that it was a triangle craft, jet black the size of a gas station or so, with two spot light on the front and one bigger one undernethe at the pointy side of the triangle, i pulled over my car and i heard no sound coming from it. it had came to a stop and was floating in mid-air, i stupidly flashed my headlights, about two seconds later it started lowering down to the ground, which gave me a better look, i could see every detail, the color the flat sides it had. i got way to scared and turned my car around and took off. then i could see in the rearview mirror that it started slowly moving again.
content.summary: Black triangle with bright huge spotlights

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching two bright objects from my bedroom window.  at first i thought they were stars, but there was a heavy cloud cover, so knew that no stars or moon would be visible.  i could hear the sound of a helicopter, but these objects did not appear to be helicopters at first sight.  i was looking through binoculars. as i scanned the sky to see what was going on, off to my right, among the trees, i saw a disc shaped, dull gray craft - totally silent and stationary, no lights, no sound, with circles of the same color running around the edge. i couldn't tell if the circles were windows or some sort of marking as nothing was lit up.  i called my son, who is 49 years old and lives with me, to see if he could verify what i was seeing.  i called 911 to report this and told them i just wanted to let them know what i was seeing in case any other calls came in. i was totally surprised by my reaction and the emotional state i was in.  i'm a rational, clear thinking person and make any judgements based on facts as i see them.  i work for the federal government and with an office full of attorneys, so i deal with facts all day long. i fell apart and could hardly talk to the 911 operator. all i could say was, "oh, god, oh god, oh god!" i managed to convey what i was looking at and the 911 operator was kind and made sure i stayed on the line. i knew, however, that i was being humored. they wanted to send the police to my home, but i asked them not to because i didn't want to alarm the neighbors. of course, the police came anyway.  they stated that there had been a bad traffic accident and the two bright lights in the sky were police helicopters.  i told them, however, that did not explain the disc shaped object in the trees.

this sighting happened in only a matter of five minutes or so. when i moved the binoculars from the disc back to the helicopters and back to the disc again - the disc had disappeard.  i discounted the fact that what i was seeing might have been some of the lenticular clouds the area around mt. rainier is famous for as the cloud cover was moving rather quickly to the northeast and the object i was observing was absolutely still and not moving at all. 

my lingering question is was the disc observing the helicopters?  were the helicopters aware of the disc?  did the disc cause the accident?  i guess i'll never know.  i feel that i need to further explain myself to the local police so they won't discount me as some unbalanced person, but i'm afraid that if i do that, it will only make matters worse.  how does a person defend themselves in this kind of situation?  why do i feel that i have to defend myself?  i know what i saw.
content.summary: The ufo was dull gray, like the current cloud cover.  silent  and stationary with no lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 19 at the time and was living in a large wooded area, decided to go and shred grass with a tractor, tractor was kept in large quansit barn 80' wide x 200' long, and 25 ' tall. i went inside opened the large rollup door on the north side, drove tractor through the door turned east then south driving alongside the barn, when i reached the southeast corner and could see across the 40 acre field, i saw somthing across the field in the southwest corner and it was below the treeline trees in that area along the boundry of the field are approx 40 -50 ft. tall.

i began reacting very irrationally fearful, angry, and began shaking my fists and shouting at what i was seeing while the tractor was still moving forward, i think about that time i put it in neutral as i rember wanting to jump off of the tractor,(i dont think i did though,

the thing is i could not put a name to what i was seeing, what i am trying to relate to you here is there was no picture in my mind that could relate to understand what i was seeing,(very freaky)

anyway while all of this was going on in my mind, i kept my eye on it.

btw i remember that it was large, i mean this is a forty acre field and this thing was big. well next thing that happend is that the craft began coming up as though it was a plane coming out of a stall, it begsn to rotate with the cockpit facing me and i actually have a picture in my head of the pilots helmet that i could see through the canopy.

time kinda stood still in a way for a moment there as i looked at him and i felt that he was looking at me (eye to eye, contact) weird didn't feel right, i dont remember watching it fly off i just kind of lost contact with the pilot, maybe that's when i jumped off of the tractor and went back inside to calm down.

at the time i called my pop and told him that a military jet must have almost crashed doing some kind of a stall maneuver over one of our fields,
but was able to pull itself out of the stall and had not crashed.

so now 27 years have passed and i began to re think about this event again i now have a few questions.

why could i not recognzse that it was a plane even if it was upside down?
could a plane really survive a stall that low to the ground,(it was below the treeline i mentioned above) and if it could why dont i remember any large amount of energy being expended to lift itself out of the stall?

one of the questions that really freaks me out is, what are the odds that exactly at the time i saw it was it at that perfect position in the stall that it appeared to me as it was motionless, i.E. hovering,
why did that pilot canopy and his helmet be so clear to me i mean what about the rest of the plane why cant i rember anything about that, the wings jet engines etc.I do seem to rember everything being black though.

as far as hearing it, well i have written that off because of the building i went into to get the tractor and then the noise of the tractor engine.

i have looked for other stories similar to this one but can't find any maybe you guys have and that's one of the reasons for wrighting this, maybe someone else has had an experience similar to this.

btw the area i was in at that time is very sparsley populated, the next closest home is a couple of miles away and i believe that they were thinking that no one would be around as i got the feeling at that time that they were just as supprised to see me as i was to see them.

hope to hear back from someone on this.

thanks

jd
content.summary: Military/experimental or craft not one of ours crashing but didn't????

content.detailedDescription: Every morning for years i walk down my driveway around 6am to get my newspaper. i always stop and search the sky for anomalies. this is the first time i saw something i couldn't explain. in the western sky i saw what appeared to be a strange configuration of four stars. all the same size and brightness. i noticed this because i had never seen this configuration before, it was so unusual. i watched intently to see if there was any movement and i noticed that the two stars in the center were moving slowly down and away, perhaps more westerly. i was careful to watch for a few minutes and noticed that they were definitely moving away from the other two "stars" they were way too high to be planes and then, as i was watching, they just "blinked" out! they weren't shooting stars, there wasn't any truly fast movement and they didn't fade, they just disappeared.
content.summary: Two moving lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing looking out my open window on the second floor appartment, while i was smoking a cigarette. i noticed a flashing light in the sky and thought it was a plane at first. but it was not moving like a plane. it would move in diferent directions instead of going in a straight line like a plane would travel. then i thought it might be a wheather balloon. until i watched it more closely. and noticed it would move to the right and then back to the same spot. then it would move to the left and then back to the same spot. then it would move in an l shape to the right and then go back to the same spot. then it would do and l shape to the left and move back to the same spot. then it would move in a circular motion. and go back to the same spot. then it would move up in the sky and move down in the sky. then it would go right back to the same spot it was. it was kind of hard to tell exactly what shape it was. but the best discription is that i can give is that it was like a circle, but a star-like with some type of redish greenish color to it. when i saw this object i went to get my brother inlaw to show him. but at first he thought i was joking and didn't want to come and see. so i went back to see if it was still there and it was. i then again went and got him and covinced him to take a look. he saw the exact same thing i was looking at and told me to get the video camera. and he filmed it. it looks kinda small on the video but it looked pretty far off in the distnace too. we stopped flming it. it disapeard over the appartment out of our site. so i came to the computer to see how to report a ufo siting. and here i am telling you my story. when i first seen the object i really wasn't shocked or anything like that. i just thought i was going crazy and thought i was seeing things until my brother inlaw saw exactly what i was seeing. after that i was kinda excited. the only thing that i would like out of this whole expeiance is to find out what i was actually looking at. i did not have time yet to down load the video yet. if you would like to see the video i will send it when asked for it. thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Circle starlike ufo changing directions

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my apartment when i noticed the bright lights through my window. my window looks out west, as i am only a few miles away from phoenix sky harbor international airport. i see planes come and go all day, as they tend to fly right over me. therefore, when this object caught my eye, my initial reaction was to coordinate the visible object to a plane. or at least convince myself it was just a very bright street lamp-  i also have a lovely view of a freeway. however, it just didn���t look the same. it stood out. i knew in my heart it was neither a light nor a plane, which is why i couldn���t keep my eye off that ���thing��� in the sky. 

it was stationary at first and about the same height as the freeway lights- but something made me keep staring. it then descended, which made me alert. i could still barely see it underneath the bridge of the highway. because it descended in the direction of the airport, i told myself it was a plane. yet for some reason, i still couldn���t peel my eyes away from the sky. i went to get my cell phone, and when i looked back up- the object was back up in the air! it was then i ran and got my camera- a canon powershot  sx20. 

i zoomed in as much as possible. i noticed it gradually going down to the ground again, only this time it was heading (my left) of the airport. almost as though it knew i was taking pictures so it went to hide, because it was stationary until my photoshoot began. it was then i fully realized this was no plane- for planes cant fly like that! they cant go down, then back up, and then down to the side! furthermore, it was extremely quiet- too quiet. i only got a few good pictures because my camera couldn���t keep good focus��� but the ones i did get��� wow. unlike anything i have ever witnessed. this was real.
content.summary: 3 bright, visible lights attached to a possible faint craft

content.detailedDescription:
So i was watching the sky since sundown tonight waiting for night four of the triangle/"v" to return. at 1945 hrs, i noticed that from the nw a orange/red/white orb was approaching with no flashing lights at low altitude. it was moving to quickly to observe through the telescope, and too slow to be anything else so i just watched it. as it was heading towards the santa cruz mountains it turned and started moving south as if it was following the highway 85 path. i then noticed that another one that looked the same was approaching it from the south. when the second reached close proximity to the first it turned around and they both headed south. maybe 10-15 seconds later, a third appeared over the same area as last night (near the quarry close to cupertino). it came from the nw (same direction the first one came from). it didn't stop and hover, it just kept on it's path and moved towards the santa cruz mountains and disappeared. at this point, all three were out of my sight. i informed my hubby of what i was seeing, but he hurt his knee at work, so he just stayed inside tonight.

(now, after i filed a report with mufon last night, i went back out and noticed that the triangle had reappeared over the mountains and just hovered there. it kinda moved a bit to the west, but generally stayed in that area.)

at about 2030 hrs tonight, i went back outside and noticed that two lights appeared in the same area of the santa cruz mountains as the one did last night at 2230 hrs. i watched these two lights and noticed that they were moving a bit also but just as before, generally stayed in the same area. just now, (2145 hrs) i was watching the two lights, and suddenly a third appeared and a few seconds later, a fourth also appeared to the naked eye. they were all lined up next to each other in a row, but not equally spaced. i went inside to get my telescope again and when i came back out i saw the lights go off on two of them. i set up and was able to see that the two left each had two white lights like headlights on a vehicle. this was from my advantage point though so people from another viewpoint might have a better description of them.

the two left didn't seem to be moving too much so i gave up and came back in. as usual i wasn't scared of them, just curious and hoping they would do something so i would have a better view. since sundown, there have been so many planes and helicopters in the affected areas. before all this started, there were planes and such flying in the area, but never like this. i wonder if this is a "cat and mouse" game the objects are playing now with the military. if so, it's kinda funny. i think this weekend, i will camp outside and have video & digital cameras set up as well as my tele. i'll keep everyone informed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It came back, and brought 3 friends!

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to the backyard to star gaze (very clear night).  i was looking up and noticed two points of light that were brighter than any planet or star in the sky and were static.  each point was about 1.5-2 degrees left of orion, and offset from each other by about 2 degrees.  my dad and i both looked at the points of light for about 10 minutes wondering they were.  we walked back into the house, and when we came out about 5 minutes later, they were gone.

our only hunch was that it was two geosynchronous satellites reflecting the sun's light back at us, but we can't confirm this.
content.summary: 2 points of light to the left of orion

content.detailedDescription:
we recently had one of the hugest snow storms since 1979.  i had driven across town in galva, il to visit friends.  after the snow storm a high pressure system moved into the area dropping the temperature to below zero.

i went outside about 9:30 pm to start my car to let it warm up.  the street runs north and south.   i walked outside looking south and up into the sky noticing how clear a night it was.  as i was still walking i scan the night sky turning my field of vision to the north.  

as i looked north i noticed a triangle shape or formation heading south.  the approximate altitude was around 1500 to 200o feet.  all i saw was three dull amber lights moving together.  as the triangle banked to its right based on relative flight path two of the lights seemed to come closer together.  then it disappeared.  flight speed would be equal to or greater than a f-16 moving at supersonic speeds

there was no sound.  no strobe light.  no red and green lights for right away flight.  i have flown cessna's and this was not an aircraft.

when i first saw the object i thought, "oh my god that's a ufo!"  i did have a camera and did attempt to get a photo however the object or objects had already banked right and disappeared
content.summary: Triangle shape or formation.

content.detailedDescription:
While anchored at pelican bay, about three hundred yards ne of the docks at cayo costa island, i observed a strange series of lights in the sky at about three am, and woke up my friend who joined me to observe the phenomena.  i happened to be on deck getting some fresh air, and enjoying the starlit skies, when i noticed moving lights over my shoulder. at first i thought it was an airplane, but it stopped moving. there were three white pulsating lights in a row. as i watched,thinking that perhaps it was a helicopter, it changed shape into a sphere with a cluster of smaller lights that were colored red, white, and green.  i was excited to observe this and made enough noise to wake my friend barbara. she got her glasses and joined me. we both observed the lights for about twenty minutes. constantly checking other areas of the sky, and stars for comparison sake.
we shared a pair of 10 x 50mm binoculars during the event.  the object held position. in the distant background were multiple flashes of lightning and very low rumbles of thunder. from our position the object was due west over the gulf of mexico, about fifteen degrees above the horizon. the object was distant enough for us to believe that a photograph would yield little usefull data. after twenty minutes with no movement or changes, we were tired enough to go back to bed even though the object was still visible.  in hindsight this seems horrible, but we were exhausted and the light show was not stunning enough to keep us awake. we have no idea when it left the area. we slept soundly after the sighting.

later we checked some pistures of the naples sightings, and thought it could be the same sort of thing.
content.summary: Two witnesses saw 3 pulsating lights changing shape from rectangular array to spherical array. colors changed from pulsating white to combination of white, green & red.  were anchored in pelican bay looking west over cayo costa 15 degrees above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was just glancing out the window at around 9 pm and i saw what looked like a big star in the sky, spotted west toward syracuse, ny.  this was odd because there was thick cloud cover and no other stars were visible.  i noted a steady light down and to the right, just above the tree line but not too far away, a few miles i guess depending on how big the thing really was...Anyway that one was moving a bit from one side to the other but behind the branches at the top of the trees a few blocks away so i couldn't say that it wasn't a plane for sure.  but the other star was up in the sky, no branches.  i looked at it for a while because it seemed to be making subtle movements.  but after a while i left to take a shower, planning to come see afterward if the "star" had moved...And it had.  30 minutes later, it was down to nearly tree level and traveling what would have been north.  sfter watching for about 2 minutes i lost track of them in the branches and clouds, but was suprised to see a very low flying plans seemingly searching the sky in that area...(and it didn't look very far away).  there is an old military complex in verona, ny (not too far away) that is "abandoned," i can't find any info on it online, my old boss who lives in the area said it was an air force base.  just throwing that out there...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brights light to the west, followed by low flying plane.

content.detailedDescription: Seen in the eastern skies daily like colorful twinkling star with windmill effect
content.summary: Saw in florida  and newyork

content.detailedDescription:
I work at a business that is located at the end of an airport.  i walked out my office door and looked to the right as there was a jet flying over the grounds just taking off from the airport.  as i looked up at the jet, i noticed a small gray object flying about 200 ft. above and to the right of the jetliner.  it caught my eye because it seemed odd that another aircraft would be flying so closely to where a jetliner was taking off, and that it was quite low.  the object was very small in comparison to the jet.  as i looked at the object, i realized that there were no wings, nose, tail, lights or anything that resembled even a single engine aircraft.  it moved in a very straight and steady deliberate path and pace.  it did not flounder from its path like a single engine aircraft often does.  i continued to follow the object with my eyes until it was impossible to see against the blue sky and the setting sun.  the color of the object appeared to be a solid gray color with what appeared to be a stripe down the side (but could have been shadowing).

my immediate reaction is that it was not a normal aircraft, and it was out of place.
content.summary: Gray flying object near lansing airport as jet was taking off

content.detailedDescription: I live in chicago and like everyone else here was snowed in yesterday wednesday 2/2/11 after 22 inches of snow came down tuesday 2/1. i was bored so i started a webcam time lapsed video of the sse chicago night sky. i figured it would be a ok night to record the sky since midway and ohare were basically closed there would be little or no air traffic. i did not see the formations when viewing the sky myself only after watching the time lapse video played back. it was recorded from about 5:45 to 6:05 pm cdt over west side of chicago on wed feb 2. it shows to me multiple sphere ufos blinking on and off while formed in to triangle shapes with other spheres, looking almost encamped in the sky. i see about three different sets of triangle lights in the video. one set of lights had four points in a square shape at the very top middle of the video but then moved back to 3 points and hovers. the video took a picture every 3 seconds of the sky. a flash of light comes across the sky at the same time the lights are blinking in the time lapse. im not sure what it is, ufo possibly, plane idk. i did my best enhancing the video the best i could to see if i could make out what shape it was. i will try and post the video here and on youtube. my screenname on you tube is guttergawker or search webcam chicago ufo 2011. ufos are very much real and are visiting earth on a daily basis in my no body special opinion. i am not sure what they want only that i see and film them quite consitently and that they are always around watching even if you can see them. thanks for reading!
content.summary: Ufos recorded on webcam chicago 02/02/11
Seen closer than most in all of its full collors

content.detailedDescription: Me, my wife,mum,dad and brother were driving home on i95 coming from orlando heading back to palm bay as we had been visiting the parks as my brother is over from the uk so i was taking pictures of the sun setting and in 1 of them there was a strange object which at 1st i thought was a plane but at the time didnt see any in the distance when id taken the picture. there was nothing in the sky when i looked to see if it was a plane and when i loaded it up to my pc it doesnt help much when i zoom in on the object so im hoping you guys can see what it is!
content.summary: I was taking pictures off the sun setting for family back in the uk

content.detailedDescription: When walking from school to catch the bus home, my friend and i,both aged 12 years, when we just happened to look up and saw a metallic-looking dot very high in the sky.  it was moving from the northwest to the southeast, moving in approximately a 30 degree arc, at which time it reversed direction in a tight hairpin turn without slowing down.  it disappeared when it had returned to the position where we originally saw it.  we thought that it was unusual but, at that time, we just kind of shrugged the sighting off.  it wasn't until later in my life that i realized that what i had seen could be considered an ufo.
content.summary: Metallic dot very high in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a ginos hamburger place.Washington blvd at monroe street.I just got out of my freinds car to walk over to another friends car.For some unknown reason i was told to look up,i was by myself,no one close to me.What ever it was,it said,look up we are real.When i looked up,i saw two bright dots,brighter than the back ground stars.One was higher than the other and the other was down and to the back of the other.They where going very fast.They went straight.I did not have time to ask my friends did you see them.It seems they came in the same line as from the airport,bwi now.I have been at the same spot for many years.Just to see if it was a plane or planes,with running lights.After years of watching,i have not seen the lights like i saw.As a kid i loved watching planes go by.They did not twinkel.It was a steady light.Did not shift colors.I have told people about this,they all said it was a plane.After seeing them my thoughts about other peoples from other planets just might be true.I still get a good feeling about what happened to me.I broke my back some years ago,had a lot of time to think about things.I have some memories of something happened as a kid of about 6 years old.I was sleeping with my father,this id not happen offen.I woke up in the middle of the night,it was warm,look out of the window,i saw a bright light of many colors going up out of our back yard.I swear it looked like  across.I woke my father up and told him something just flew up out of the yard.He got up on one arm and looked out the window,but it was gone.I told him it was there.He told me to go back to sleep,it was just the goodyear blimp.This was about 1951,1952.This was late at night,and i think it was before the blimp.I have heard many storys from people over the years,of what they have seen.I feel better telling you my story.
content.summary: It happened really fast.They just came across the sky.Very brite.

content.detailedDescription:
I was encouraged by my dear friend derrick vaughn to summit this account of what happened that night while everyone's attention was on obamas state of the union speech that very night so here i go.
  
i saw this  object for two hours the same exact time president��������� barack obama was giving his state of the union speech ..I heard choppers and jets fly��������� right over my house but couldn't see them. this object stayed in the same position about a 1/2 hour, and then moved over the same area of maryland dc and va.. the lights red and green turquoise where very foreign to that air space and where pulsating around almost like a circle shape. thats the only way i could describe them.. . the lights seemed to moved around this object then stop to one solid light and then pulsate again to this green turquoise light that glowed a emerald green that was beautiful. every plane that moved towards it double back around the same direction it came from. it seemed to stop the flow of air traffic/space movement..

i watched out the same window for 13 years and have monitored the flow of air traffic to and from the ronald reagan airport. i have also have worked fueling planes for that same airport and sort of know the light patterns of planes at night..These light where something very different indeed. i was so excited and nervous at the same time i called up my kids 7-19 years of age to verify what i thought or was a ufo. their reaction was the same as mine. i gave them no suggestive thought but only to look out the window and describe what the saw. their response was immediate "what in the heck is that". my 14 year old son was the one that noticed how the planes seemed to be turning around in the same direction they where coming from almost-waiting for permission to cross that quarantined air space. 

after around two hrs i went to answer a call and when i returned the strange light where gone. the air traffic eventually returned to normal and i retired for the night. the next morning i check the web to see if any other have seen these light but got no hits..Later that day my son called me and said " dad someone else have recorded what we have seen and posted it on you-tube". my reaction was immediately searching for that video, which i found and this person described the same-thing i saw that night to the letter..The quality of the camera was not that great but i was happy someone else saw and verified.

you can check out the video and comments by others in that area who left their account on what happened that night of the obama sate of the union speech..

i have posted the youtube link below check it out for yourself
peace!..

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo over washington dc while obama gives state of the union speech 2011

content.detailedDescription: It's been over 30 years and my mother and i are still disturbed about it. we will never forget it. it haunts us. i will do the best that i can to describe it.  1978,sierra vista-ft. huachuca; we were watching tv in the late evening when a very loud machine(not an engine not a motor)hovered directly over our house. it's so hard to describe a sound that you have never heard before or since. there were two different sounds. one was a constant hum, low in tone and loud; but soft not deafening like a e-a6b. the other was rotating counter-clockwise higher in pitch. the closest thing i can associate it with is a hula hoop; but, it wasn't a steal ball (or bearing) rolling.  more like a metal scrapping.  we looked at each other, jumped up ran to the door and it was gone!  the neighbors ran outside too. there was nothing out there. no traces of sound, light, vehicle--nothing. the whole thing lasted 10-12 seconds.  the most disturbing thing about it was that we had this sensation (not quite a vibration, closer to fuzzy) feeling. and we new some how they were watching us. i've read a lot of stories. everyone describes lights and no sound. there was no light.  it was dark outside. if there was a light we would have seen it. i read about this one women that thought she had been scanned. i believe that.  it's the only thing that makes sense. i have lived next to military bases all my life(50years). for the last 30 years, i have lived under the flight path. i can sometimes wave to these pilots they are so close. nothing like this! and there is nothing that appears and disappears that fast.
content.summary: Huge hovering circular machine directly above our house. it was loud! gone in 10 seconds without a trace.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend ryelee were in 4th grade. this is the scariest thing that has ever happend to me. we were playing in the sprinkler, and all of a sudden everything got dead silent. the breeze stopped blowing, everything...Nothing moved anymore. we turned around to look right above my house and there it was. it was right above my house....It was medium sized. it was dark black, it was a circle with two points on the front. it was shapped as a cat head(in one of your logo's you have an object like this, it looked like that). it slowly pointed downwards at us...There was a window on front but it was too tinted, we could not see in to it. we starred in disbeleif, i couldn't even think i was so confussed. after about 1 minute of it hovering there, it flew away as quick as it came and dissapeared behind a cloud. i have seen things ever since this day. i know what i saw was reall, my friend remembers it all too. have you ever seen anything like this? please e-mail me with any information you have about an object like this, i have been researching it for a while now and have found nothing.
content.summary: Cat head shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Abc4.Com story:

strange lights appear in the sky above utah county
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

published: 1/27 7:29 pm updated: 1/28 10:29 am

american fork, utah (abc 4 news) - reports of strange lights in the night sky have people in utah county talking about ufo���������s. three red lights appeared between 7:15 and 7:30 last night. witnesses say they hovered in formation and dropped what appeared to be flares.

(deleted) lives in highland and is one of those puzzled by what she saw. "i don't believe in extra-terrestrials.��������� but she also doesn���������t believe the lights were from airplanes or helicopters. she says they didn���������t make a sound, and there were no blinking lights, just a constant red. 

"i noticed over the roof of the garage a red light and white light and the red light isn't flashing like a plane light and that's what draws my attention to it." she says soon there were three red lights and those lights started dropping white streams.

(deleted) was a few miles away in american fork. he was in the parking lot of a shopping plaza when he saw the lights hanging in the sky. galbraith was in the air force and says his experience caused him to take special notice of the unusual lights. he grabbed his cell phone and started taking video. 

(deleted) said, "they looked like they were flying in formation perfectly together and then whatever was dropping looked like it was burning real bright." 

(deleted) says he doesn���������t believe the trails of white that dropped straight down from the red lights were flares. he says military flares don���������t look like that. "they usually shoot out the sides, or they shoot down, and there are a lot of them and you could definitely hear them." he says there was no sound. 

he says he could not make out the shape of the flying objects, but says they were unlike any plane or helicopter he has ever seen, and they were flying at an unusual altitude.

(deleted) husband also witnessed the lights and streams. he was once an employee of a company that manufactured components for military flares. 

(deleted) says he could not identify what the flying objects were, but agrees with galbraith���������s assessment that what was being released was not a flare. ���������after a couple of seconds he knew it wasn���������t a flare. 

he didn���������t know what it was.���������

no one else seems to know either. the control tower at the provo airport had no reports of anything unusual last night, nor did the utah county sheriffs department. 

salt lake international's control tower had no incidents documented, and officials at camp williams also had nothing to report. both witnesses we talked to say the objects eventually just flew away.
content.summary: Three red lights appeared between 7:15 and 7:30. witnesses say they hovered in formation and dropped what appeared to be flares.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on a bench in the very northern point of the keweenaw peninsula of upper michigan across from fort wilkins state park. i was looking for satellites to track. all of a sudden i spotted one and started tracking it, but within seconds it had changed directions. it headed west then reversed itself, then reversed again.Then suddenly headed south for almost out of sight and reversed again to about where i first saw it and beyond to the north, then west again and another reversal. then suddenly it just vanished. this was the day after the space shuttles "return to flight mission" after the re-entry disaster. my wife susan witnessed the whole dance in the sky. i know the difference between a satellite trajectory and speed compared to what we saw. this was 3 to 4 times faster.
when we saw the footage a few years later of what the space shuttle captured on film i got a chill down my spine.
over the past 30 years i have witnessed similar incidents of what i thought was a satellite suddenly making a 90` turn and vanishing.
in the mid 80's, in auburn hill, mi i saw a craft in the fog. it was huge, and it made no sound. it appeared as large as a jumbo jet, but it was only about 150 feet off the ground. it had three lights across the back and the colors were more of a pastel shade. it was more of a cigar shape and the lights were equally spaced. one in the middle and one at each end.

i am writing to you now because i am no longer afraid of what others would think. my wife and i know what we saw. as a test, i traced what i remembered the aug 2006 sighting was and i asked my wife ; "do you know what this is",, her reply was "yeah, that's what we saw in the keweenaw. during the original incident, i was excited to see it. i have never been scared of a ufo, i have always believed it was ludicrous to think we are the only species in the universe. i honestly pray, before i die, that the world publicly admits to such events.
content.summary: Round dot in sky like a satellite
